code: import React,{Component}from"react";import Article from"../elements/Article";class Articles extends Component{constructor(props){super();this.state={articles:[]};}componentDidMount(){const devTo="https://dev.to/api/articles?username=jcoelho";fetch(devTo).then(response=>{return response.json();}).then(data=>{let articles=[];data=data.slice(0,4);data.forEach((element,index)=>{articles.push(React.createElement("div",{className:"column",key:index},React.createElement(Article,{key:index,title:element.title,url:element.url,image:element.cover_image,extract:element.description})));});var offset=4-data.length;for(var i=0;i<offset;i++){articles.push(React.createElement("div",{className:"column"}));}this.setState({articles:articles});});}render(){return React.createElement("section",{className:"section",id:"articles"},React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},React.createElement("h1",{className:"title"},"Articles"),React.createElement("h2",{className:"subtitle is-4"},"My latest articles"),React.createElement("div",{className:"columns"},this.state.articles)));}}export default Articles;
